Ref: CXP006/2022
Closing date: 10 November 2022

The job position requires you to support and promote the implementation of the Project Safety, Security and Quality plans; Support and promote the implementation of the Project Execution Plan; Provide strong leadership and coordination to ensure the site team is working effectively to achieve the project KPIs.

Location: Jacobs, Durban

Main Duties include:

-Must understand and be able to implement MS Project Plans and ensure key milestones are met. Be able to take corrective action for any project deviations or scope creep.

-Provide weekly and monthly progress reports.

-Must be able to problem solve technical, logistical or personnel issues that may arise.

-Lead the workforce and manage labour requirements effectively and efficiently.

Criteria:

-Minimum 10 years Senior Site Management experience.

-Must be Red Seal Trade Tested (Instrumentation or Electrical). Minimum education level.

-Must hast have own transport.

-Must be based in Durban and prepared to work in other provinces with RSA
